title: GitLab Enhances DevSecOps Platform with Claude AI: Boosting Security and Efficiency \ Anthropic

metadata.title: GitLab Enhances DevSecOps Platform with Claude AI: Boosting Security and Efficiency \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Discover how GitLab leverages Anthropic's Claude AI to power innovative features across their DevSecOps platform. Learn how this partnership enhances code generation, vulnerability analysis, and development speed while maintaining security and reliability for enterprise customers.
